papers.summary: Paper with UT Austin and Emergent AI at Intel Labs on multimodal representation transfer with fMRI encoding model
Collaboration with Technion, Ben Gurion, and Parallel Computing at Intel Labs on redesigning tokenizers and pre-training code LMs for use in high-performance computing and compilers
Co-first author work on a DNN-based encoding model to account for temporal context effects in neuroscience

conferences.summary: Served as an invited discussion panelist at LLM Day [website]
Organized in-person/hybrid Memory in Artificial and Real Intelligence (MemARI) workshop [website]
